newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Konka Group in US$20 mln loan.
newsitem.headline: Konka Group in US$20 mln loan.

text.p: The following syndicated loan issue was announced by bookrunner Sumitomo Bank.
BORROWER KONKA GROUP COMPANY LTD
AMOUNT US$20 MLN TYPE TERM LOAN
MARGIN L+150BP MATURITY 5 YRS LAUNCHED 02.JUN.97
PUTS YR 3 CALLS NONE REPLIES 20.JUN.97
DRAWDOWN -- AVAIL 6 MTHS HOME CTRY CHINA
REPAYMENT 5 EQUAL SEMI-ANNUAL INSTALMENTS AFTER 3 YRS' GRACE
ARRANGERS ING BANK'S SHENZHEN BRANCH (FACILITY & SECURITY
AGENT) AND SUMITOMO BANK (BOOKS)
MGT LEVELS AND FEES
EXTENSION FEE OF 0.2 PCT FLAT
COMMITMENT FEE OF 0.3 PCT PER ANNUM
LEAD MANAGERS US$4-5 MLN 90BP ALL-IN 180
MANAGERS US$2-3 MLN 75BP ALL-IN 175
NOTES PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO FINANCE THE BORROWER'S
EXPANSION OF PRODUCTION CAPACITY AND FOR OTHER GENERAL
CORPORATE PURPOSES.
A LETTER OF SUPPORT FROM SHAREHOLDERS: SHENZHEN SPECIAL
ECONOMIC ZONE OVERSEAS CHINESE TOWN ECONOMIC
DEVELOPMENT CO AND KONG WAH INTERNATIONAL CO LTD
-- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6960
